description: An AI content generator that automatically produces complete high-quality, unique, SEO-friendly articles in a single click.
title: High quality, AI content generator - Article Forge
introduction: Article Forge is an AI-powered content writing tool that revolutionizes the content creation process. It offers a free 5-day trial and a 30-day money-back guarantee. The tool can generate unique, high-quality articles, pass Copyscape, automatically post to blogs, and provide bulk article generation and API access. It is available in Standard and Business plans with additional features like custom user accounts and increased article throughput.

faqs.question: How does Article Forge work?
faqs.answer: Article Forge intelligently researches, plans, and writes high-quality, unique articles automatically based on the provided keyword, article length, and optional customizations.

faqs.question: Is the content generated by Article Forge unique?
faqs.answer: Yes, all articles created by Article Forge are completely unique as it uses deep learning instead of scraping. Each article passes Copyscape with zero duplicate content.

faqs.question: What is the free trial and money-back guarantee offer?
faqs.answer: Article Forge offers a free 5-day trial and a 30-day money-back guarantee. If users are not satisfied with the tool after creating less than ten articles, they can request a refund with no questions asked.
